uprn.description: UPRN of the property to which the location refers

name.description: Name / title for this access point. 2nd part of primary key

xCoordinate.description: X grid coordinate of access point

yCoordinate.description: Y grid coordinate of access point

responseCode.description: Trunout information for the Vision command and control system for the access point

dataSource.description: Where this data has come from - Ordnance Survey, legacy, etc
